p: Coronaviruses (CoVs), a member of the Coronaviridae family, are spherical (approximate diameters of 60–140 nm), enveloped, positive‐sense RNA viruses and include four genera of Alphacoronavirus, Betacoronavirus, Deltacoronavirus and Gammacoronavirus (Cascella, Rajnik, Cuomo, Dulebohn, & Di Napoli, 2020; Li, Luk, Lau, & Woo, 2019).
